doc:
Justus D. Barnes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justus_D._Barnes 0 Justus D. Barnes (October 2, 1862 – February 6, 1946) was an American stage and silent film actor. Barnes is best known for his role as an outlaw in the 1903 short silent Western, The Great Train Robbery. Justus_D._Barnes ( October_2_,_1862 – February_6_,_1946 ) was an_American_stage and silent_film_actor . Barnes is_best_known for his_role as an_outlaw in the_1903_short_silent_Western , The_Great_Train_Robbery .
